name: Raphael's Story
description:
The game is set in 1850's in London, Rats everywhere and the place is a mess. Pollution ruins the city day by day. Your name is Raphael, You are a feared thief, but you got caught. As punishment you are to be thrown into a shit stained, mostly toxic sewer system, but they threw you into the wrong one and didn't notice. You were thrown into a sewer that hasn't been used for a really long time and you come to notice that you weren't the first that had been there.

we are a small team of 5 that had really no clue how to make a game. We had 2 weeks and 1 extra week, but we worked for 2 weeks only. This is out first game and sadly we couldn't finish it in time. We might update the game and finish it, but we'll see. i wouldn't get my hopes up. We are students at StadinAmmattiOpisto in Helsinki Finland and this was our first video game project so far.
